snippet.title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition | PlayStation 5 & Xbox Series X|S Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition is OUT NOW for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S!

This upgraded edition of the beloved action-adventure brings 4K resolution, ray tracing, and enhanced lighting and shadows.
On a DualSense controller, you’ll also get to experience the full impact of haptic feedback, adding extra depth and immersion to every strike as Death. The game’s loading times have been drastically improved thanks to SSD technology, ensuring a smoother experience overall.

Become the terrifying force which everything fears but nothing can escape. Awakened by the End of Days, Death, the most feared of the legendary Four Horsemen embarks on a quest to redeem his brother's name. Along the way, the Horseman discovers that an ancient grudge may threaten all of Creation. Death lives!

- Links & Info -
Website: https://darksiders.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Darksiders
Discord: https://discord.gg/darksiders
